ComicInfo.Title: Vidoetape; Blue Angel; New Geometry Theory
ComicInfo.Summary:
Two bi-chicks use home movies to lure men, a concert pianist is seduced by a curvacious stripper, and a man of the world explains his talent for seducing two women simultaneously!
